data.lyric:
[ti:Raining]
[ar:Lil Ghost小鬼]
[al:Raining]
[by:zhaoxin_karakal]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Raining - Lil Ghost小鬼
[00:03.28]词：Lil Ghost 小鬼
[00:06.56]曲：Lil Ghost 小鬼
[00:09.85]编曲：百川Rebellious/张帅
[00:13.13]人们总是和时间在比赛
[00:17.40]都生怕停下来
[00:19.59]我更喜欢比生活慢半拍
[00:22.98]
[00:25.00]与其去幻想空洞的未来
[00:29.30]何不享受现在
[00:32.13]相信一切都是最好的安排
[00:36.12]Nothing to do
[00:38.32]I just wanna dance for you
[00:41.29]刚好轻松的程度
[00:44.18]别忘了重点是人生的旅途
[00:47.91]No one but you
[00:50.03]Nobody can do it but you
[00:53.19]感谢你的不服输
[00:56.25]沿途的风景比终点更精彩
[00:59.65]The world is gonna rain rain rain rain rain rain
[01:02.98]But I'm sure
[01:04.88]
[01:05.69]初心揣口袋
[01:08.79]You will be alright
[01:11.57]The world is gonna rain rain rain rain rain rain
[01:14.82]But I'm sure
[01:16.66]
[01:17.53]被欲望打败
[01:20.59]Because they don't like
[01:24.53]
[01:26.13]单纯的少年
[01:27.25]在玻璃上画笑脸
[01:29.11]伴随着雨点
[01:30.30]再见每一个昨天
[01:32.22]他也曾沦陷
[01:33.34]但从不愁眉苦脸
[01:34.81]在痛和累中褪去了懵懂
[01:38.07]但他从未过放弃
[01:39.16]有人说自不量力
[01:40.18]可他坚信
[01:40.91]于是鼓起了勇气
[01:42.09]但是却无能为力
[01:43.28]过了年纪
[01:43.94]男孩已不再年轻
[01:45.12]满腔热血已褪去
[01:46.22]但依旧不变的是
[01:47.34]不放弃和当初的决心
[01:49.10]他唱着 wo
[01:50.96]I just wanna dance for you
[01:53.96]刚好轻松的程度
[01:56.67]别忘了重点是人生的旅途
[02:00.63]No one but you
[02:02.78]Nobody can do it but you
[02:05.78]感谢你的不服输
[02:08.69]沿途的风景比终点更精彩
[02:12.16]The world is gonna rain rain rain rain rain rain
[02:15.42]But I'm sure
[02:17.47]
[02:18.33]初心揣口袋
[02:21.42]You will be alright
[02:24.27]The world is gonna rain rain rain rain rain rain
[02:27.36]But I'm sure
[02:29.64]
[02:30.24]被欲望打败
[02:32.99]Because they don't like
[02:37.36]
[02:42.01]Because they don't like
[02:45.17]Because they don't like
[02:48.89]
[02:53.86]Because they don't like
[02:56.93]Because they don't like
[02:59.80]Lalalalalalalalala
[03:05.74]Because they don't like
[03:07.34]Cause they don't like differences
[03:09.69]Don't let them kill my vibe
[03:11.58]Lalalalalalalalala
[03:17.69]Because they don't like
[03:19.31]Cause they don't like differences
[03:21.42]Bring me to another sky
[03:25.65]制作人：百川Rebellious/Lil Ghost小鬼
[03:26.47]混音监制：百川Rebellious/Lil Ghost小鬼
